verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dweshamu eershalokamulo athyadhika Prema neelo andhakaarapu lokamulo neeve Divyajyotivi andhakaara paapamandu neeve Satyamaargamu bhariyimparaani maranapu Baadhalo neeve satya devudavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shakhti heenudanaiyunti neeve naadu Sahaayudavu krungi yunna samayamulo Thandriga kaugita cherchitivi nitya jeevita vasa Ramulanu theerchu vaadavu neevegaa baadalo Himsa shramalayandu nityamu aanandintunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jagamuna yudha kalahamulu shaanti lene Ledechata Yesu prabhuvaa nee dwaaraa Aananda bharitudanatini ghoramou thuphaanu Leva hrudayamu kampinchenu bheetin Bhayapadakudani prabhuve palka Nimmalinchenu thuphaanu{/lang-eng}
